title: 12/29/20 – DPS – Best Of
itunes:title: 12/29/20 – DPS – Best Of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre fill in for Dan Patrick and declare the end of Cam Newton’s career as a starting quarterback in the NFL. The guys get in a fiery debate over whether or not Carson Wentz is handling adversity in an appropriate fashion. Doug and Jason explain why the Chiefs might struggle in the postseason and discuss professional athletes focusing on their brand over mastering their sport. They get in a heated debate over Deshaun Watson and speak with MMQB’s Albert Breer about who might coach Trevor Lawrence in Jacksonville next year!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
